Description: Rim and body sherd of South Ionian pottery plate; very micaceous orange clay, white inclusions; exterior of rim glazed; band on wall and glazed area below; interior, cream slip: on lip, zigzag with T-pattern; at outside of floor band with superimposed red line; to centre, rays facing in, no doubt part of triglyph frieze; drill hole on broken edge for analysis.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (p. 59, fig. 20, Table 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.917)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 150-1, Nau 120, pl. 26c-d)
